title: I dreamed that I dyed my hair yellow

preview.html: Through this topic, we will learn together about the interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair yellow, red, and many other colors from the interpreter, so stay with us. I dreamed that I dyed my hair yellow. In general, this vision in a dream indicates fatigue, illness, and envy. The dream also symbolizes the presence of many haters in the dream. The life of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation scholars say that if a pregnant woman sees that she has dyed her hair yellow and is pleased with the appearance of her hair. This is a praiseworthy vision that heralds the birth of a woman, and God knows best. But if the yellow color is dark, and the dreamer does not show signs of acceptance and happiness. It is a disturbing sight and indicates On the problems and diseases that afflict them during pregnancy and childbirth. Yellow hair dye in a man’s dream means illness and distress, and in a young man’s dream, sins and disobedience. Whoever dyes his hair yellow may enter into dispute and enmity with some people, and God knows best. Buying yellow paint in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a person. Jealous, he constantly looks at the blessings of others and does not look at the blessings that God has given him. The dream also expresses hatred, envy, and a keen eye, and God knows best. There are some interpreters who said that the color is yellow in the dream. It indicates a bright future and a life full of joy if the color yellow is bright. And shiny. Dying hair a light yellow color in a dream is evidence of engagement in the dream of a bachelor and an unmarried woman. A woman who was late in a dream yellow dye warns her of an imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Dyeing black hair yellow in a dream is a sign of radical changes in the dreamer’s life. From It turned gray and changed its color to yellow. He may be exposed to temptation in religion, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams for hair loss in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing hair dye in a dream for a single girl. Dyeing hair in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds goodness and optimism in her coming days. Whenever The darker the colors, the better for light colors, as they have great meaning. If a girl sees that her mother dyed her hair, this is a sign that the mother supports her daughter and is trying to help her change her life. But if the dreamer dyes her mother’s hair, it will improve and honor her. Seeing Hair dyed red in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will be engaged. Whoever dyes her hair purple will receive a large sum, and God knows best. It is said that black paint indicates marriage and the fulfillment of wishes soon. Whoever dyes her hair white will become more anxious and her marriage may be delayed. There are other sayings that say She will not get married, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing hair dye in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees in her dream that she is dyeing her hair, she will enjoy a marital relationship full of love, understanding, and psychological comfort. Black paint in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s love for her husband, and God knows best. If a woman sees that she She dyed her white hair brown in a dream. It is a praiseworthy vision that reflects fertility and pregnancy. Dying blonde hair in a dream means problems and disagreements between the dreamer and her husband.

title: Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream varies from one person to another depending on the details of the vision and the personality of the monarch. It can be one of the visions that brings good to the viewer, and it can be one of the visions that brings evil. I will present to you all the interpretations of this vision through the following points: The interpretation of seeing a dispute in a dream indicates changes that may occur to the dreamer in the recent period. Seeing a fight in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer feels angry about many things in his life. If one sees In his dream that he is arguing, this indicates that he is arguing with an effort and doing something useless. Seeing a quarrel in a dream means that the dreamer sees that forgiving people makes a person weak. Seeing a quarrel in a dream may indicate that the dreamer does not like to quarrel with anyone in reality, so he empties this Negative charge in a dream. If someone saw in a dream that he was arguing with someone about a disagreement with him, this indicates reconciliation between them in reality. Seeing a fight between two people in a dream could indicate the love that exists between them. If a married man dreams that he is arguing with His wife, this indicates the end of the dispute between them and good conditions. Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream for a single girl varies according to her status in the dream. Among the interpretations of this vision: Seeing a fight in a dream for an unmarried girl means that bad news will come. To her, which will cause her great sadness. Seeing a fight in a dream for an unmarried girl may mean that she will soon marry a good man who will love her and bring her happiness. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is arguing with a young child, this indicates the judgments and family problems that she will suffer in the coming period. Seeing a fight with the family in a dream for a single girl shows the motivation she receives from her family and friends.. to achieve the goals that she wants to achieve. Seeing a fight in a dream announces with his unmarried sister that he will soon obtain a prestigious position. Seeing a fight with parents over an unmarried woman in a dream may indicate That he stays away from them... because of the harm he suffers from them. Seeing a fight with a familiar man in a dream with an unmarried girl means that she will marry him in reality in the near future. If an unmarried girl sees that she is arguing with her friends in a dream, this indicates disagreements Which will arise between them in reality in the near future. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that someone has beaten her, this means that she will marry this person in reality. However, if the quarrel includes weapons, this indicates the sadness that she will suffer from in the near future. Seeing a fight in a dream for a single woman can indicate feelings of despair and loss of hope. The meaning of seeing a fight in a dream for a single woman. I will give you several other interpretations of seeing a fight in a dream about a single girl through the following points: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is arguing with someone Unknown, this indicates her distance from God and the commission of sins and misdeeds. This vision serves as a warning to repent to God.If the woman is unmarried

title: What is the interpretation of magic in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Magic is one of the most terrifying things on earth. For this reason, everyone who sees a dream about magic will be affected by fear and panic in order to learn the meaning of this dream and its interpretation, and will be affected by fear of the future and what will happen to him. Studies have proven that some dreams in which a person sees is an image that appears from the subconscious due to thinking about it a lot or watching it a lot, and this causes a process Stored in the reactions of the subconscious mind, so in this article we will learn today what is the interpretation of magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing magic in the interpretation of a dream by Ibn Sirin: If he sees that he has been affected by magic, this indicates that bad deeds await him. And if he sees that he wants to tempt others, This indicates a trial that will befall him and he will be tested because of it. As for him using magic to manage his affairs, it indicates good news and happiness. And if he sees in a dream someone practicing magic, this indicates the righteousness of all of them. The magic of decrypting indicates the nearness of comfort, God willing. And whoever sees that he is controlling Others, through his magic, shows his strength and authority. And if he sees that he has revealed magic in a dream, this indicates his insight into people. If he is exposed to magic and resists it, this indicates the wisdom of his mind and people’s love for him. And if he sees magic buried in his house, this indicates turmoil. Interpretation Seeing witchcraft for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees witchcraft in her dream, this means that she is unstable in her life and has no meaning. And if she sees a magician, this indicates a traitor, a hypocritical friend, or a relative who does not wish her good. And if she sees that she has been witchcraft, this indicates that she She is in danger and that there are those who want to insult her and her honor. If she sees that she is bewitching people, this indicates that she is suffering from adversity, and if she sees that she is using magic to satisfy her need, then this indicates the closeness of a man, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about magic for a married womanIf a married woman sees magic in her dream This indicates the deception of her relative or friend, as well as her recklessness in making decisions related to her marriage. It could also indicate that he does not take important matters seriously and needs to pack his belongings a little. If he sees magic and sorcery, this indicates the pursuit of desires, sins, and misguidance. Interpretation Seeing a place of magic: If he sees a place where magic is performed in a dream, this indicates illness, poverty, and evil in life. And if he sees a place of magic in his house in a dream, this indicates a lack of faith. If he sees a place where magic is performed, this indicates ignorance and misguidance in religion. Interpretation of seeing spells Magic: Seeing magic spells in a dream may indicate what we previously explained about seeing magic in general, and this may be from Satan who wants to terrify the heart of the believer. Interpretation of seeing magic from relatives: Melting relatives in a dream indicates severing the kinship link between the dreamer and them, or hatred and hatred. And envy on the part of relatives. In conclusion, he said that dreams are an image stored retroactively in the stomach mind, and not everything we see in our dreams is the truth or all interpretations are correct, because God is the highest and most knowledgeable.

title: Interpretation of dreams: I am riding a camel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a camel in a dream. There are different meanings that express what you see, so we present an interpretation of the dream that I am riding a camel in a dream. We were talking about scholars, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a camel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am riding a camel in a dream could be a signal. For travel or rest, and God knows the unseen. When you see a camel riding, it may symbolize the dreamer’s journey, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer is seen riding a camel that does not walk, it may lead to imprisonment, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself riding a camel with a hump, this may be evidence of Hajj, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams That I am riding a boat in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am riding a boat in the sea in a dream could indicate good things, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen riding a boat, this may lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a single girl riding a boat may indicate recovery, and God knows the unseen. It also reflects the vision of driving in a boat and that it is going in a good way, and it can be evidence that life is going in a good way and that God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream that I am driving a wheel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am driving a wheel in a dream can be a reference for benefit, and God knows the unseen. When you see a man A married woman riding a bicycle, this may indicate achieving goals, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees herself riding a bicycle in a dream, this may be evidence of the kindness of the partnership, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself riding a bicycle, this may be a sign that Things have become easier, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat in a dream may differ depending on the driver, driving, etc. Whereas if a married woman is seen driving a car with her husband in the back seat, this may lead to him supporting her, and God knows best. However, if an unmarried girl sees a car with her fiancé in the back seat and an accident occurs with her, this may indicate matters that require thinking or some obstacles, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself driving the car with an unknown person in the back seat, this may indicate Someone who supports him, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in a dream with a head of state. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with a head of state in a dream may express his high status, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man driving a car with a head of state, this may indicate his high status, and God knows best. And since if he sees The dreamer himself is riding in a car with a head of state in the back seat, as this may be evidence of a promotion at work, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself driving a luxury car with a head of state, this may mean that he will reach a position of prestige, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about driving An open car in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about driving an open car in a dream could be evidence of instability, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a single girl driving a car without a roof indicates...

title: Interpretation of dreams that I work as a carpenter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I work as a carpenter in a dream In the following lines, we will learn about the interpretation of the dream that I work as a carpenter in a dream and whether it is good or bad, all this and many other details that interest you. Interpretation of dreams that I work as a carpenter in a dream Interpretation of dreams to work as a carpenter in a dream Seeing a carpenter can be a sign of good things, and God is higher and more knowledgeable When you see a carpenter, this can be a sign of superiority, and God knows the unseen If the dreamer sees a carpenter, it may lead to victory over his enemies, and God is higher and more knowledgeable If the dreamer sees a carpenter, it may express kindness and sustenance, and God knows the unseen Interpretation of a dream that I became a dentist in a dream Interpretation of a dream that I became a dentist in a dream can be a sign of things that are not good, and God is higher and more knowledgeable Where he can express the responsibilities that bother him, and God knows the unseen If the dreamer sees that he has become a dentist in a dream, this may be evidence of negative changes, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of seeing black hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing black hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, black hair is one of the things that distinguishes Arab girls and is a sign of beauty and health. Seeing white hair in a dream is one of the dreams that can appear to anyone, especially those with black hair, because this dream has many positive interpretations and meanings that indicate nutrition, health of the body, mind and strength, and in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing black hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. If the one who saw black hair in his dream is rich, this is a sign of the abundance of his money and the abundance of his livelihood, and God Almighty is the Most High. If the dreamer with black hair is poor, this is an indication of the sins committed by the dreamer. If the man is righteous and has good behavior and conduct, and sees black hair in his dream, this is evidence that this man has strong faith, fears God Almighty, and is close to Him. If the dreamer is a female, black hair portends many people who come to her by God’s command. Seeing black hair for a married woman and the innocence of her husband and a testimony of his righteousness and great love for her and his children, and God Almighty is the Most High. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black hair in a dream for a single woman. Commentators, led by Ibn Sirin, believe that if a single girl who has not been married before sees long black hair in her dream, this is a sign of her close marriage to the desired partner who was kind and loving. For her. But if she sees someone in her dream cutting her hair and her hair is long and black, then it is one of the completely rejected visions and does not bode well, God forbid. And cutting her long black hair may be a sign of her marriage to a bad man with whom she will not be happy and will not be reassured about herself, and he will see her next to him, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. The longer the black hair in the dream of a single woman, the more it indicates goodness, grace and abundance of sustenance. But if this hair appears among strangers or is wrapped in the market, for example, with unknown people, then this indicates that she is not married and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black hair in a dream for a married woman Ibn Sirin believes that if a married woman sees black hair in her dream, this is evidence of her husband’s intense love for her, his honesty, integrity and justice. But if she sees herself in her dream taking off her veil or removing her hijab, then this is evidence of the husband’s journey or absence. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black hair in a dream for a divorced woman Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a divorced woman with black hair in her dream means That she received support from those who help her in her life and that her life will change for the better and better after he helps her and there is compensation for everything she experienced in her previous experience. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black hair in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her hair is black and long, this means that she will give birth to a male child and will have a close relationship with his family. Likewise, black hair in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of tremendous goodness, abundance of sustenance, and ease by God’s command.

title: Interpretation of a dream about putting a black veil on the head in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of putting a black hat on the head in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream of putting a black hat on the head in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know its interpretation. He knows that the site managers do not make interpretations, but they save the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about putting a black hood on the head in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is putting a black hood on his head in a dream can indicate the strength of character that the dreamer had at that time. Who dreams of putting A black cap on his head could indicate the marital happiness that the dreamer enjoyed in those days, and God knows best. A dream of putting a black cap on the head in a dream may indicate the visionary’s effort to achieve goals and ambitions during these days. In the event that you see a black veil on the head in a dream It may indicate repentance to God, Blessed and Most High, and an end to the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup to another person in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is applying makeup to another person in the dream, it may indicate that some flaws are hidden. In that person, and God knows best. Dreaming of makeup for another person, the dream may indicate that he is a disabled person and should be kept away from them. Seeing another person wearing makeup in a dream could mean that the dreamer will be exposed to deception and lies, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing another person wearing makeup In a dream, it indicates an imbalance in the dreamer and he needs to ask God for help, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting an earring on the nose in a dream. Putting the neck over the nose in a dream may mean that the dreamer has a great interest in himself at that moment. In the case of seeing a nose stud in a dream This may indicate a promotion at work or a good event that will happen to the dreamer, thanks to God. Seeing a pierced nose in a dream may indicate bad news for the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting artificial teeth in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is putting artificial teeth in The dream may indicate the great good that will come to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the installation of artificial teeth in a dream is evidence of the kindness and love that surrounded the vision in his life at that time. Seeing the installation of artificial teeth in a dream may mean the end of adversity and fears. Which the dreamer faced in her life during those days. Dreaming of placing artificial teeth in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of placing dental fillings in a dream: Seeing dental fillings in a dream may indicate support and assistance in one’s needs. Vision in his life. If you see the placement of dental fillings in a dream, this may indicate advice that the dreamer needs from family and friends. Seeing the placement of dental fillings in a dream can indicate important things in the dreamer’s life that he needs to preserve. In the event that one sees himself placing Having dental fillings in a dream, this may indicate the great effort made by the dreamer

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing licorice in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of licorice in a dream has been completed, according to the books of leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, as well as through the Hadouta website, which specializes in the sciences of interpretation. Therefore, we present to you, dear followers, all the facts and details of the complete interpretation of licorice in a dream, as well as insights into the dream of a licorice seller and everything related to the complete interpretation of licorice in a dream for single people. Women, pregnant women, and men. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing licorice. Interpretation of seeing a full drink of licorice in a dream is one of the desired visions that indicates goodness and good physical health for the dreamer. Also, seeing a full drink of licorice in a dream indicates that the dreamer will easily obtain many good things. And blessings. Seeing warm licorice in a dream full - means that the dreamer will fulfill his desires and achieve difficult things. Pouring licorice on the dreamer in a dream full is sick, and the good news is that he will easily get rid of his illness. Full serving of licorice in a dream is a sign that The dreamer will achieve high and lofty positions in his life. Licorice in a dream is full for a common woman. The interpretation of seeing licorice being offered to strangers in a dream is one of the visions that portends her imminent marriage. Drinking licorice in a dream full for a single woman is evidence that she will receive many of the good things she wants. Whole licorice in a dream indicates that you will have to go through a failed romantic relationship that will end quickly. Preparing licorice in a dream whole and offering it to someone is an indication of her relationship and marriage to the same person. Filled candy is a dream for a married woman. Complete consumption of licorice in a dream for a married woman indicates... The approach of providing pregnancy and a fair heir. Seeing licorice in a dream also full for a married woman indicates a happy and peaceful life that she enjoys with her husband. Seeing licorice in a woman’s dream means kindness and support, in addition to her receiving many benefits and blessings. But seeing rotten licorice In a dream, it is evidence of the many problems between her and her husband and the instability of her life. Why does a pregnant woman dream of licorice? Seeing a pregnant woman’s licorice drink in a dream is complete evidence of the ease of childbirth and getting out of it without problems and troubles. Also, seeing licorice in a pregnant woman’s complete dream is one of The desired visions for her in general are a sign of kindness and support for her. This vision indicates that God will bless her with a healthy child free from all diseases, God willing. Why does licorice dream? The interpretation of seeing licorice in a dream is complete from the visions about which it was said in the books of scholars that it is desirable. Also Seeing licorice in a dream is a good sign for the dreamer and many blessings and pleasant surprises. Seeing a whole licorice drink in a dream for a sick person is a sign that the illness will stop and a speedy recovery, God forbid. The completion of a licorice seller in a dream is the interpretation of seeing a full licorice seller. In a dream it is a symbol of kindness and survival, which will soon be sent to the dreamer. Also, seeing a licorice seller in a dream is pleasant.

title: Interpretation of smoking cigarettes in a dream - the meaning of cigarettes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Smoking in a dream - Buying cigarettes in a dream - Interpretation of smoking in a dream Ibn Sirin - Smoking tobacco in a dream - Smoking in a dream Ibn Sirin - Smoking cigarettes in a dream - Smoking in a dream Interpretation of a dream about smoking cigarettes If you dream that you are smoking a cigarette, you do not know some things. And if you sit with cigarette smokers, you will be surrounded by people who tend towards haram in their lives. If you are holding it or see someone drinking it, this is a sign that you know something bad or a despicable act that you hesitate to show to anyone you love. Interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream Seeing someone smoking in a dream is one of the dreams that carry many connotations, as the interpretation varies depending on the position of the dreamer who sees it He smokes in a dream, and the place where smoking is done in the dream. Seeing smoking in a dream is a sign that the dreamer needs to take a vacation, away from all the pressures surrounding him and from any obligations that burden the dreamer. If someone dreams that he smokes in a dream and this dreamer does not smoke Actually, this vision means that the dreamer is a person who can protect himself well from bad people around him who want to harm him. If one dreams that he sees himself smoking in a dream, but another person smokes in the dream and this person is in a relationship with the dreamer, then this vision indicates that The dreamer will break up with that person and there will be disagreements between them. If one smokes in reality and dreams that he smokes in the dream, then this vision is a warning to the dreamer of something that will happen in reality and cause him harm. If one dreams of seeing cigarettes in a dream and the smoke from cigarettes is dark black, This dream is often a warning to the dreamer about the problems that he will face, but if the smoke comes out of the cigarette in a clear color, this indicates that the dreamer will achieve non-permanent successes. If a person dreams that he is smoking in a dream and while smoking he feels joy and pleasure, this means in reality that the dreamer He has a strong feeling of loneliness. Some interpreters believe that seeing smoking in a dream about someone who does not smoke in reality is a sign that the dreamer is facing a big problem in reality, and if the dreamer is already a smoker, it means that he will have some obstacles delivered. If one sees in Dreaming that he is smoking in a place with a no smoking sign, this means that the dreamer is facing so many problems that he has lost hope in thinking of solutions to them. If you see in your dream that a group of people around you are smoking, but you refuse to smoke, then this dream is a sign of These people cause harm to the dreamer in his life. If a person smokes in reality, but sees himself in a dream quitting smoking, this indicates that all the problems that the dreamer has in reality will be able to solve them with all determination. Smoking can be in The dream serves as a warning to the dreamer that he is not being honest with himself and that he needs to improve his situation. In some cases, seeing cigarettes in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will receive support from a friend to solve his problems or will gain high status.

title: Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Everything you are looking for to know the interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them. The interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them. What are the important and clear connotations of the cockroach symbol in a dream? Is the interpretation of small cockroaches different from that of large cockroaches? What are the meanings and interpretations of seeing yourself killing cockroaches? You will find the interpretation of your dream in the following article. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them. Jurists said that the cockroach is an evil insect, and if it appears in a dream, it warns the viewer of the presence of a malicious enemy that is chasing him and wants to harm him. Killing cockroaches in a dream means that the enemy who caused the dreamer fear in his life and lost his sense of comfort and security will be defeated in a way. Or another. People's enemies are not only humans, they can also be jinn, and therefore if the fortuneteller has been afflicted or damaged in the past by black magic and dreams that he killed a cockroach, he will defeat the jinn that destroyed it. Life, and this spell will be lifted soon. If the dreamer sees that he is killing a cockroach with his hand in a dream, then he is able to provoke, fight and win battles, no matter how exhausting and difficult they are, and soon he will defeat his enemy without anyone’s help. But if the dreamer sees a large cockroach in his dream and is afraid of it and asks Helping a relative of his to kill this cockroach on his behalf, as he is a weak person and his abilities are limited, and he will need help from his relatives and acquaintances until he emerges from his judgments and triumphs over his enemies. Seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets cockroaches as an evil eye and intense envy that afflicts the dreamer, and if he is able to kill If you see cockroaches in the vision, he will enjoy his life, and be cured of the painful symptoms of envy that caused him to stumble. A lot and they feel physical and psychological pain. And if the dreamer sees that he is killing a cockroach that attacked one of his family members, then it helps in treating that person from witchcraft or envy, and legal rukia is used in his recovery. Cockroaches can appear in a dream with other insects, such as scorpions or spiders, If the dreamer dreams that he is killing a cockroach and a spider, then he will defeat two enemies, one of which is cunning and malicious, and the other is harmful and harmful. Evil. But if the dreamer sees in the dream a cockroach that turned into a large black snake, then this is an enemy that deceived the viewer by saying that he is weak and helpless, but in reality it is a fierce enemy and if the viewer kills this snake, then he is ready to confront any enemy that attacks him and will prevail in the end, God willing. Seeing cockroaches in A dream about killing a single woman: If a cockroach sees an unmarried woman and runs after her in a dream, and is able to surround it and kill it, then the dream indicates the presence of an evil person after her for dishonorable ends, and God will announce his intentions to her. Man, and thus he is able to save himself from it, and this is his greatest revenge. If an unmarried woman sees that her hair is full of cockroaches and then cleans it and kills all the cockroaches that filled it, then the dream indicates many problems and thoughts that caused her distress and sadness, but she will remove these thoughts. Futile out of her mind. To achieve peace of mind and happiness. If cockroaches fill food...

Man, and thus he is able to save himself from it, and this is his greatest revenge.
